thread.title: Romelu Lukaku will sign a new Everton contract, confirms agent Mino Raiola
thread.title_full: Romelu Lukaku will sign a new Everton contract, confirms agent Mino Raiola

author: tgannon
title: Romelu Lukaku will sign a new Everton contract, confirms agent Mino Raiola
text:
Sticking with Toffees Romelu Lukaku will sign a new Everton contract, confirms agent Mino Raiola 
Belgium striker is a transfer target for former club Chelsea but looks set to snub a sensational reunion By TOBY GANNON 
Keep up to date with ALL the Everton news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
But Raiola, when asked if his client would commit his future to the Toffees, told talkSPORT: “Yes.” 
When pressed, he added: “99. ! 
“We are signing a longer contract, so that is for sure the intention [to stay]. Related Stories Zlatan Ibrahimovic was 'Cantona-esque', Manolo Gabbiadini deserved cup and Everton's entertaining midfield has them flying KOE SO KEANE Burnley defender Michael Keane set for mega £28million move to Ronald Koeman's Everton this summer London Calling Everton star Romelu Lukaku drops not-too-subtle hint at Chelsea return with Champions League tweet MY LUK'S OUT ON FIFA 17 Romelu Lukaku trolls Fifa 17 after he's snubbed in latest ratings - and might go to Pro Evo Whole Lotta Lovre Everton lead West Ham and Southampton in the race to sign Gent goalie Lovre Kalinic 
“In football, contracts are not there to be going until the end sometimes, but there is always two parties in the deal. 
“If everybody thinks it is better to move on, then that will be done at that moment. But for this moment, he is signing a contract with Everton.” 
Lukaku’s current contract expires in 2019. Romelu Lukaku equals Duncan Ferguson goal record for Everton
